nodes.text: Su Torka was a soldier who served in the Rebel Alliance's army and was stationed at Echo Base on the planet Hoth. Working with soldiers like Private Emon Kref, Torka used a rifle that jammed regularly during the Galactic Empire's invasion of Hoth in 3 ABY. Rebel ground forces ultimately retreated during the battle and a number of personnel abandoned Echo Base through an evacuation sequence.
Su Torka was mentioned in the short story "Beyond Hope," written by Michael Moreci as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
